I20040517

By accident, I was renaming a method to another method which matched on return 
type and arguments.

Moving to JDT UI for comments.

The problem is that the CU -> SearchMatch[] is being removed as the CUs are 
being iterated.
The simpliest fix is to switch the remove() to a get() in 
RenameAnalyzeUtil.analyzeRenameChanges2

Another more efficient way, if you are concerned would be to use an entrySet 
over the keySet and you wouldn't have to do the get().
